issue.title: [CF 204] About Icon Event
issue.body:
test version: R80,R81,R82
I tested announcements, TMW can't announce anything for any configuration.
Icon Event bug:
If use "Usable" to show.Event "On Finish" will not work.TMW only play the sound of "On Start".

Test Icon String

``` ^1^T^SManaCheck^B^SShowTimer^B^SANNOnFinish^Stest2~ASAY^SSoundOnStart^SHeart^SType^Scooldown^SCooldownCheck^B^SCooldownShowWhen^Sunusable^SUseActvtnOverlay^B^SRangeCheck^B^SName^S2812^SANNOnStart^Stest1~ASAY^SEnabled^B^SSoundOnFinish^SIM^t^N42001^^ ```

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #204 | Raw

comments.body:
Whoops. I put in a last minute change that broke it completely. Fixed in r82; I'll look at the other bug tomorrow.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Icon Event bug only happened in "SoundPlay", Announcements isn't have this bug.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Thanks for your hard work.
Have a good rest.^.^
/hug


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

I am lazy to open a new tickets-.-

Ardent Defender can add to Defensive Buffs
:D

Edited May 19, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

All fixed in R83.
Thanks for your hard work.
/massage
